node.title: F1's Bahrain Grand Prix to run without fans due to virus - WCTI12.com
node.description: DUBAI, United Arab Emirates (AP) — Formula One's Bahrain Grand Prix will run this month without spectators as the island kingdom fights an outbreak of the new coronavirus, organizers announced Sunday. Mideast stock markets fell sharply amid a plummetingâ€¦

node.title: NHL Highlights | Hurricanes vs. Penguins - Mar. 08, 2020 - SPORTSNET
node.description: The Pittsburgh Penguins surrender a first period lead and the Carolina Hurricanes don't let up, going on to win 6-2 with two goals from Justin Williams.

node.title: Memphis Grizzlies sign rookie Jontay Porter after knee injuries - ESPN
node.description: Jontay Porter, a forward/center out of Missouri, has signed a deal with the Memphis Grizzlies through 2020-21, the team announced Sunday.

node.title: 2020 Arnold Palmer Invitational leaderboard, grades: Tyrrell Hatton earns first PGA Tour victory at Bay Hill - CBSSports.com
node.description: Hatton claimed his first Tour victory on Sunday by holding off Rory McIlroy and a host of other challengers
